myTunes

vsTunes.

Your music, movies, and TV shows take center stage.

vsTunes is the best way to organize and enjoy the music and movies you already have — and shop for the ones you want. Enjoy all the entertainment iTunes has to offer on your Mac and PC.

Music

50 million songs, zero ads.

Stream over 50 million songs, ad-free. Or download albums and tracks to listen to offline. All the music in your personal vsTunes library — no matter where it came from — lives right alongside the vs Music catalog. Start your trial today with no commitment, and cancel anytime.

Start Your Trail Now

vs Music is available in vsTunes, and for iOS and Android devices.

The movie collection you always wished for. Granted.

With over 100,000 movies to choose from, there’s always something great to watch on iTunes.1 And if you watch on Apple TV 4K, you’ll be able to enjoy tremendous selection of your favorite content in 4K HDR. So get ready to enjoy the hit movies you’ve been waiting to see — anytime, anywhere. Just tap to play, or even download if you’re going somewhere you won’t have Wi-Fi.

Learn More

A world of entertainment. Available wherever you are.

The iTunes Store is available on all your devices, which means you can buy that catchy song you just heard or rent that movie you’ve been meaning to see, anytime you want. And since your entire library of music and movies lives in iCloud, everything you buy is immediately available, no matter how you want to play it.
